page.title: 04Fishing
page.content: The river Sour and several recently created lakes give very good fishing.The river weeds are little sedge reed, milfoil and bullrush.The local angling club have caught 24 mink beetween 1983 and 1984.Mink make a of differents because before they were caught there were hardly any birds near the river.The biggest fish caught in this part of the river is a chub at 2lbs 10oz.There has been some chemical pollution in recent years but the source of the pollution has been found and corrected.To replace fish lost through disease and pollution,the Wessex Water Board rears many thousands of fresh water fish each year.These are mainly roach ,bream,perch,minnows,gudgeon and dace.
